metadata.title: CVE-2024-57887 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm: adv7511: Fix use-after-free in adv7533_attach_dsi()The host_node pointer was assigned and freed in adv7533_parse_dt(), andlater, adv7533_attach_dsi() uses the same. Fix this use-after-free issuebyÂ dropping of_node_put() in adv7533_parse_dt() and calling of_node_put()in error path of probe() and also in the remove().
